content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


-- Using the abfss bulk 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) AS [result]


-- Examines the data types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

-- Check the length of the columns 
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationId)) AS len_LocationId,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(sevice_zone)) AS len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) AS [result]

-- Change the 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR =''\n''
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]'

-- Use the COLLATE to change the datatype 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )
    AS [result]

-- Create the database using collate but create the database
CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]

-- Select subset the columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW =TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50)
    )
    AS [result]

-- Read data of nyc_without the header  and specify the index of the columns and ordinal of the columns 

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT 1,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )
    AS [result]


-- By specifying the index, we ignore the column name and replace with our choice of name. 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )
    AS [result]

-- Create External Data Sources (only in the datasabe that we mention the use database)
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data 
WITH (
    LOCATION= 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/' 
)

-- Create External Data Sources until the raw folder, so that when you take it, it will started in the raw folder 
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION= 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl52.dfs.core.windows.net/raw' 
)

-- Use the External Data Source to get the data without having the whole long https or adfss
-- Designing the data sources so that it will placed in the database that we want 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw', 
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW =2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )
    AS [result]


-- Drop External Data Source 
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data;

-- Check the location of the data sources 
SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;
